mapper.sql: id, member_id, brand_id, make_id, model_id, car_id, buy_year, current_mileage, remark, type, create_time, last_update_time
mapper.insert: insert into member_car (member_id, brand_id, make_id, model_id, car_id, buy_year, current_mileage, remark, type, create_time, last_update_time) values ( #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{makeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buyYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentMileage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
